item.title: [Resolved] Too sensitive
item.dc:creator: mrbits
item.description:
I have a few words that my app listens for, things like “set”, “ok”, etc.

The problem is, it has a min dog it’s own and picks up on the slightest of background noise and detects it as a word.

If I just mumble something random it gets detected.

Is there any way of reducing the sensitivity?

item.description:
